Week 12 - Idyll & Intro to Scientific Viz with AVL

Today we’ll cover a brief intro of Idyll and web development in general.

We’ll also be getting a lecture from the Advanced Visualization Lab at NCSA who will talk about scientific and cinematic visualization. We’ll cover scientific visualization more next week.
